caption.p: Return periods of storm-surge heights. Results are shown for the modern (blue) and future (red) periods for ( A) the MPI model, ( B) the CCSM4 model, ( C) the IPSL model, and ( D) the IPSL model where future simulations extend to 2300. The 95% credible interval of storm-surge events is shown in light blue for modern and in light red for future.
